About Me

Hi, my name’s Adam and I’m a engineering manager. Well, right now I’m a house husband, father, cat-dad, and skateboarding instructor but I am currenly seeking new a new role in the tech sector. Most recently I spent 2 years with the excellent folks at Drip, an email marketing startup, working on the Platform team mainly focused on infrastructure and core services. Before that I was in consulting and worked on a variety of interesting projects in the financial sector. I like figuring things out, writing code, and finding ways to be useful. I also used to be a postman, as we Brits call our mailmen, and walk around delivering Netflix DVDs by hand (I once had a parcel for Gillian Anderson although sadly she was not at home). I have experience working on web apps in Rails and Java and I’ve clocked up a fair bit of time nosing around in AWS.
